https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fLn4GYsJSl9jtWz6dOlstq2GRMP.jpg An ex-thief returns for the revange of his father's murder makes an intelligent plan to reach the killer, a godfather named as Ghost. During his robbery operations, he plays with the police chief who is trying to stop him. In his final robbery, he finds something different than what he expects, something bigger. Cingöz Recai
